features.title: Elegant Kimono Designs
features.description: Transform your favorite anime characters with stunning traditional Japanese kimono designs and modern fashion elements.

features.title: Glamorous Makeup
features.description: Create stunning looks with professional makeup tools, from natural beauty to dramatic Met Gala glamour.

features.title: Luxury Accessories
features.description: Adorn your characters with exquisite jewelry, hair accessories, and fashion-forward pieces for the perfect look.

features.title: Evening Gowns
features.description: Dress your anime queens in breathtaking evening gowns inspired by the most prestigious fashion events.

features.title: Creative Freedom
features.description: Express your unique style with endless combinations of outfits, makeup, and accessories.

features.title: Met Gala Magic
features.description: Experience the magic of the Met Gala through the eyes of anime's most beloved characters.
